name: Dark mode for www.textivate.com (v1.0.1)
description:
Textivate is a website that helps people learn some text. You have to have a subscription to make a set though :/ **hinthinthintquizlet.comalternativehinthint**

My French teacher assigned this website to everyone. So in return, here's a dark mode if you enter this website :)

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info:
Future: More bug fix updates if I still have access to this website and style settings might get added.

v1.0.1
- A few changes with how borders look.
- Title change, www. added so the result possibly appears on the widget: Dark mode for textivate.com --> Dark mode for www.textivate.com (v1.0.1)
- Few bug fixes.
v1
- Public release
